joxy.painter

Class TextFieldHoverIndicatorPainter

  • java.lang.Object
    • joxy.painter.TextFieldHoverIndicatorPainter

  • public class TextFieldHoverIndicatorPainter
extends Object
    Painter for a hover indicator. A hover indicator is drawn around a button if the mouse is hovered over it.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TextFieldHoverIndicatorPainter() 

    • Method Summary

      static void paint(Graphics2D g2, float x, float y, float width, float height, int opacity)
      Draws the hover indicator.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TextFieldHoverIndicatorPainter

    • Method Detail

      • paint

        public static void paint(Graphics2D g2,
         float x,
         float y,
         float width,
         float height,
         int opacity)
        Draws the hover indicator. Note that a hover indicator is a 'border' around the rectangle given here.
        Parameters:
        g2 - The Graphics2D to paint with.
        x - x-coordinate for the left upper corner.
        y - y-coordinate for the left upper corner.
        width - Width of the shape.
        height - Height of the shape.
        opacity - Opacity of the hover indicator, with 0 completely transparent, and 255 completely opaque.
